text: David Victor Peacock (born 24 May 1945) is an English rock pop singer and bass guitarist. Peacock is best known as having been one half of the English musical duo Chas & Dave between 1974 and the death of Chas Hodges in 2018. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:English rock singers Category:English rock guitarists Category:English pianists Category:Bass guitarists Category:Banjo players Category:Musicians from Middlesex Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London
title: Dave Peacock (musician)
